title: Model Intake (v0)
purpose: Capture whether tenant has an Excel/Sheets model and how it should be used.

questions.prompt: Do you already have a model you want to use (Excel/Sheets)?
If yes, how will you provide it?
Any notes about the model (tabs, required inputs, pain points, what you trust/don’t trust).
Should we default to the TitleApp standard model when your model is missing/incomplete?
